title: Web Development
description: Learn modern web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks

title: Design
description: Master UI/UX design principles and tools like Figma

title: Data Science
description: Explore data analysis, machine learning, and AI fundamentals

title: Mobile Development
description: Build native and cross-platform mobile applications

title: Introduction to React
description: Learn what React is, why it's popular, and how it differs from vanilla JavaScript. We'll cover the virtual DOM, component-based architecture, and React's declarative approach.

children.text: Welcome to React! In this lesson, we'll explore the fundamentals of React and understand why it has become the most popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

title: Components and Props
description: Deep dive into React components - the building blocks of any React application. Learn about functional components, props, and how to compose components together.

children.text: Components are the heart of React. They let you split the UI into independent, reusable pieces that you can think about in isolation.

title: State and Lifecycle
description: Master React state management with useState hook. Understand component lifecycle and how to manage side effects with useEffect.

children.text: State is what makes React components interactive. In this lesson, we'll learn how to add and manage state in functional components using hooks.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive
description: Explore all the built-in React hooks including useContext, useReducer, useMemo, useCallback, and useRef. Learn when and how to use each one.

children.text: Hooks are functions that let you hook into React state and lifecycle features from function components. Let's explore the full hooks API.

title: Forms and User Input
description: Learn how to handle forms in React, including controlled components, form validation, and handling multiple inputs efficiently.

children.text: Forms are essential for any interactive application. React provides a powerful way to handle form state and validation.

title: Introduction to Next.js
description: Discover Next.js, the React framework for production. Learn about server-side rendering, static site generation, and the App Router.

children.text: Next.js is a React framework that gives you building blocks to create web applications. It handles the tooling and configuration needed for React.

title: App Router and Navigation
description: Master Next.js 14+ App Router. Learn about file-based routing, dynamic routes, route groups, and navigation patterns.

children.text: The App Router is built on React Server Components, enabling you to build applications that span the server and client.

title: Data Fetching Patterns
description: Learn the different data fetching strategies in Next.js including Server Components, client-side fetching, and caching strategies.

children.text: Next.js provides multiple ways to fetch data for your application. Understanding when to use each approach is key to building performant apps.

title: Deployment and Optimization
description: Deploy your Next.js application to Vercel and other platforms. Learn about performance optimization, image optimization, and best practices.

children.text: Now that you've built your application, it's time to deploy it to the world. We'll cover deployment options and optimization techniques.

title: TypeScript Fundamentals
description: Get started with TypeScript. Learn about types, interfaces, and how TypeScript improves your JavaScript development experience.

children.text: TypeScript is JavaScript with syntax for types. It helps you catch errors early and provides better tooling for large codebases.

title: Advanced TypeScript Types
description: Master advanced TypeScript concepts including generics, utility types, conditional types, and mapped types.

children.text: Advanced TypeScript features give you the power to create highly reusable and type-safe code. Let's explore these powerful concepts.

title: TypeScript with React
description: Learn how to use TypeScript effectively with React. Cover typing props, state, events, refs, and common patterns.

children.text: Combining TypeScript with React gives you the best of both worlds - component-based UI with full type safety.

title: Introduction to Sanity
description: Learn what Sanity is and why it's a powerful choice for content management. Understand the Content Lake and real-time collaboration features.

children.text: Sanity is a platform for structured content that comes with an open-source editing environment called Sanity Studio.

title: Schema Design
description: Design effective content schemas in Sanity. Learn about document types, object types, and best practices for content modeling.

children.text: Good schema design is the foundation of any Sanity project. Let's learn how to model content effectively.

title: GROQ Query Language
description: Master GROQ, Sanity's powerful query language. Learn to write efficient queries, projections, and joins.

children.text: GROQ is a query language designed to work with JSON documents. It's powerful, expressive, and fun to use.

title: Sanity App SDK
description: Build custom content applications with Sanity App SDK. Learn useDocument, useDocuments, and real-time editing patterns.

children.text: The Sanity App SDK lets you build custom applications that read and write to Sanity in real-time.

title: React Fundamentals
description: Master the core concepts of React including components, props, state, and hooks

title: Advanced React Patterns
description: Level up your React skills with advanced hooks, forms, and performance optimization

title: Next.js Essentials
description: Learn the fundamentals of Next.js and modern React development

title: Production Next.js
description: Take your Next.js apps to production with data fetching and deployment

title: TypeScript Core
description: Build a strong foundation in TypeScript fundamentals and advanced types

title: Sanity Fundamentals
description: Learn the core concepts of Sanity CMS and content modeling

title: Sanity Development
description: Build custom applications and master GROQ queries

title: React Masterclass
description: The complete guide to React development. Start from the basics and progress to advanced patterns. Learn components, hooks, state management, forms, and best practices used by professional React developers. By the end of this course, you'll be able to build complex, production-ready React applications.

title: Next.js: The Complete Guide
description: Master Next.js 14+ and build modern, full-stack React applications. Learn the App Router, Server Components, data fetching strategies, authentication, and deployment. This course covers everything you need to build and deploy production-ready Next.js applications.

title: TypeScript for React Developers
description: Level up your React development with TypeScript. Learn type safety, advanced types, generics, and how to properly type your React components, hooks, and applications. Perfect for developers who want to write more maintainable and error-free code.

title: Sanity CMS Deep Dive
description: Become a Sanity expert. Learn content modeling, schema design, GROQ queries, and how to build custom content applications with the Sanity App SDK. This course is perfect for developers who want to leverage Sanity's powerful features for their projects.
